page.title: Austria #39;s Elfriede Jelinek Wins Nobel Prize for Literature
page.text: Austrian novelist Elfriede Jelinek was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature on October 7. True to the mood of despair cast in her novels (which include The Piano Teacher, Lust, and Women as Lovers), Jelinek, 57, said that she quot;can #39;t stand quot; the attention
